feature1.explanation: Both texts include informal punctuation like hyphens and lack of proper capitalization, indicating a casual writing style.

feature5.explanation: There are no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text, showing consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical features, sentence structure, discourse style, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
